description: A React functional component named VideoCard that displays a video thumbnail, title, channel info, and meta-information. It handles click events to navigate to a watch page for the specific video, with a 'compact' mode for display.

methods.name: VideoCard({ video, compact = false })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a video card with thumbnail and metadata, navigates to watch page on click

ctags.name: VideoCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function VideoCard({ video, compact = false }) {$/
